item.description:
Join P-Collective member Virak and bring on the FUNK!

Get your funk on and see the Master, right here in Providence and at Lupos!!! Really, does it get any better on a Friday night?

Check it out!:

http://lupos.com/events/george-clinton/?utm_source=Lupo%27s+Email+List&utm_campaign=be8c0fa363-September_219_21_2012&utm_medium=email

Doors open at 8pm

Show at 10:00pm

George Clinton & Parliament Funckadelic
at Lupo's Heartbreak Hotel
September 28, 2012 10:00 PM
Tickets $25

Please confirm that you got your ticket in your RSVP!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Virak is hosting this one! Please look at his picture!
item.name: Get yo' FUNK on with George Clinton @ Lupos! This Friday night!!!
